definition: to stay warm/to protect against the cold
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: His bedroom was tolerably large, and rather difficult to warm in bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 他的房间相当大，在恶劣的季节里相当难于保暖。

sentences.english: Thing is, headphones don’t offer much warmth and getting cold ears isn’t fun.
sentences.chinese: 问题是，耳机不能保暖，耳朵越来越冷这就不好玩了。

sentences.english: This soup helps to enhance blood circulation. It is a winter delicacy that helps to keep our body warm.
sentences.chinese: 此汤行气活血，特别适合冬天服用，可帮助驱寒保暖。

sentences.english: Acrylic blankets and shawls are both warm and washable.
sentences.chinese: 丙烯酸纤维的毯子和围巾又保暖又耐洗。

sentences.english: Indoor and outdoor belle shoes very comfortable, warmth.
sentences.chinese: 室内外冬鞋很舒服，保暖性好。

sentences.english: Mittens are a better choice on colder days because your fingers will share their body heat.
sentences.chinese: 连指手套可以更好的帮助手指和身体一体保暖。

sentences.english: On the far farm the armys arms are kept warm by a swarm of bees.
sentences.chinese: 在远方的农场上，陆军的武器被一群蜜蜂保暖。

sentences.english: Igloos were a basic way for the Inuit to keep warm.
sentences.chinese: 雪屋曾是因纽特人的一个基本保暖之道。

sentences.english: The picnickers hired some warm clothes for a trip up the mountain top.
sentences.chinese: 旅行人为登山顶而租用一些保暖衣服。

sentences.english: If the watch is used to time, the Yurong Fu is used to keep warm.
sentences.chinese: 如手表是用来计时的，羽绒服是用来保暖的。

sentences.english: Angoras may need special protection from the coat cold for about a month after shearing.
sentences.chinese: 割毛后，安哥拉山羊需要大约一个月的特殊保暖措施。

sentences.english: He also arranged some warm clothes as it was very cold in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 因台北天寒，他也借了一些保暖的衣物给我。

sentences.english: This double-glazing keeps in the heat and keeps out the noise.
sentences.chinese: 这种双层玻璃窗既保暖又隔音。

sentences.english: Sure, socks keep our feet warm and dry, but what else can they do?
sentences.chinese: 袜子能保暖防潮，还能做什么？

sentences.english: Cosy and irresistible to protect baby from winter chills!
sentences.chinese: 冬季必不可少的防寒宝贝，超级保暖。

definition: to defend against the cold/to keep warm
